about_the_game:
Meet Cutie Panda – your new office buddy designed to transform your work experience. This charming, talkative panda grows with you, bringing warmth and joy to your daily grind. Now you don't need to travel far to see the national treasure anymore, you can raise one right on your computer screen! Here’s how Cutie Panda makes your work life better:

Nurture and Grow Your Panda:

Players will take on the role of a panda caretaker by clicking on the panda to interact with it. The panda can respond to you with words or occasionally invite you to play mini-games:

• Bathing the panda - Unlock: Level 1

• Cleaning up for the panda - Unlock: Level 1

• Panda jump training - Unlock: Level 1

• Tidying up the panda’s toys - Unlock: Level 5

• Grooming and beautifying - Unlock: Level 10

• Bamboo-breaking contest - Unlock: Level 15

• Caring for a sick panda - Unlock: Level 20

• Collecting trash in the panda’s room - Unlock: Level 25

By completing mini-games and reminders, you’ll earn bamboo as a reward, which the panda can eat to level up. When leveling up, besides unlocking many minigames, the panda will also talk to you with even more content!

A Reminder Buddy to Help with Daily Tasks and Build Good Habits:

Cutie Panda isn’t just about fun—it’s also a practical tool that helps you build better habits and stay organized:

  • Consistent Reminders: Cutie Panda's gentle prompts can help you stay on track with deadlines, meetings, and daily tasks.

  • Improved Focus: Unlike phone apps that can easily get lost in the notification clutter, Cutie Panda resides right on your desktop which can help you avoid distractions and maintain a focused work mindset.

  • Enhanced Well-being: Get reminded to take breaks, drink water, and stretch, boosting your overall well-being and productivity.

  • Positive Energy: A cute and friendly companion can brighten your workday and reduce stress, making your work environment more enjoyable.

With Cutie Panda, you can transform your computer into a more productive and enjoyable workspace.

Simple, Nostalgic, and Offline-Friendly:

Cutie Panda has a minimalist design, using nostalgic pixel graphics and a super cute user interface, running smoothly on your PC/laptop and does not require an internet connection.

If you're busy, you can minimize the game window to the Taskbar, and the panda will still wave at you, inviting you to play together.Cutie Panda encourages a relaxed gameplay style, combining reminders to drink water and fostering healthy habits while using a computer.

Features:

:) Name your panda and watch it grow from a tiny cub into a lovable companion. Feed your panda with bamboo shoots, care for when it misses you, and play with it frequently!

:) Pre-scheduled healthy habits upon install, no need to set them up yourself.

:) Create as many reminders and healthy habits as you want. Edit and delete them as you see fit.

:) You can quickly switch to your native language anytime with our 4 language options: English, Tiếng Việt, 中文, 한국어.

:) Enjoy a full year of fun with your panda with seasonal themes.

:) The app works totally offline so you can play with the panda anytime.

:) One click to conveniently turn off music from main screen - but of course your panda loves you to hear its voice when it misses you. What to say? It loves you!

Let Cutie Panda become your daily entertainment tool, healing your soul and helping you reduce stress and pressure from corporate life!

What are you waiting for? Install now and start raising a panda!
detailed_description:
New Release

The new update for Cutie Panda will introduce the following features:

  • Lucky God Skin Giveaway: All users who created their accounts before the update will receive a Lucky God Skin.

  • Quest System: The Search for Legends: Unlock 4 out of 7 lands to uncover clues.

  • Space Decoration Feature: Customize your space with various items, change outfits, and add multiple backgrounds for personalization.

  • Gacha Feature - Spin to Win Surprise Rewards: For every 3 times you feed your panda, you’ll earn one spin to unlock exciting prizes.

    • Reward Rates:

      • Normal: 70%

      • Common: 25%

      • Uncommon: 5%

      • Rare: 3%

      • Epic: 0.1%

      • Ultra Rare: 0.01%

      • Legendary: 1 in 400,000

      • Mythic: 1 in 10,000,000

  • New Mini-Game: One additional mini-game has been added, bringing the total to 9.

  • Bug Fixes and Audio Enhancements: Resolved existing issues and added new sound effects.


Coming soon

With future updates, Cutie Panda will introduce the following features:

  • Addition of new mini-games

  • Expansion with 3 new exploration lands

  • Addition of more decorative items

name: Cutie Panda: Find the Legend

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Cutie Panda: Find the Legend

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Take care of a panda and watch it grow up every day! Team up with panda to tackle fun missions, collect clues, and uncover the long-lost legend of the magical panda world. Adventure awaits!
